name: Traveler's Chant
flavorText: Your chant lifts your allies’ steps and helps take their minds off the drudgery of the journey.
text: For the ritual’s duration, you and up to eight allies who heard the whole performance of the ritual can travel farther than normal. For the purpose of determining how far you and the allies can travel in an hour or a day, treat the group’s speed as the slowest member’s speed + 2. Focus: A musical instrument you play as part of performing the ritual.
componentCost: 10 gp, plus a focus worth 5 gp
